Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Texas in 1965...
Earned first career win on 7/9/1968...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1972 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Texas in 1972...
Traded from Texas to Cincinnati on 7/23/1973 (Going to CIN: P G. Garber, P S. Spinks, 2B J. Martinez. Going to TEX: RF J. Wynn)...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/13/1979 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/13/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $2,225,252 per year...
